RACE.RACE_TEXT: A.P. Smithwick Memorial Steeplechase H. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 1 2 1/16M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 150000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES A HANDICAP HURDLE FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. This is a Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. Closed Saturday, July 8, 2023 with 10 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELFAST BANTER (IRE) saved ground near the rear of the field, jumped well to maintain position while along the inside, advanced once in the flat given a notch to work with and bid powerfully into contention spinning into upper stretch for the final time, overthrew the leader a furlong out and drew clear in hand to the finish to prevail comfortably on the wire. HISTORIC HEART (IRE) tracked the top pair along the inside in closest aim of them jumping well to maintain position, came under coaxing midway on the turn once in the flat, took over narrow command straightened away into upper stretch, dug in coming under quick threat and was overhauled a furlong from home, ran on to chase the winner home, no match for that one, while clear of the rest and along second best. FREDDY FLINTSHIRE was in behind foes at the start when the flag was dropped, settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, jumped well to maintain position unhurried until called upon once in the flat after the final flight, advanced strongly into contention near the head of the stretch, dug in under a drive and ran on to secure the show honors. NOAH AND THE ARK (IRE) was also in behind foes at the start, saved ground at the tail of the field, came under urging after the final fence and passed tired rivals in the flat. WEST NEWTON (GB) a bit washy, showed the way along the inside at times jumping inwards to nearly leave the course just after fences three, five and seven, however maintaining just enough bounce back to get inside the dog once more each time, settled into a comfortable rhythm and remained on hold even once in the flat until midway on the final turn when under challenge from GORDON'S JET to the outside, yielded to that rival spinning into upper stretch for the last time and tired. REDICEAN (GB) traded a bump at the start with SALVINO, tracked the pace along the inside jumping well to maintain position, came under urging after the final jump and tired in the flat. GORDON'S JET (IRE) forwardly placed just off the inside tracking the leader in closest aim, jumped well to maintain position, came under coaxing issuing a challenge midway on the final turn, took briefly command spinning just off the inside into upper stretch at the quarter pole, got headed by HISTORIC HEART straightened away and tired. SALVINO (IRE) traded a bump at the start with REDICEAN, grew a bit rank under restraint just off the inside in mid pack, past the stands for the initial time before settling into the second turn two to three wide, tracked the front two to three wide coming under coaxing after the final fence and tired. WELSHMAN just off the inside just off the pace, came under urging midway on the final turn in the flat, faltered in the stretch and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Freddy Flintshire
ENTRY.COMMENT: beh foes st, 2p near rear, strong bid flat, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Redicean (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: traded bump st, tracked ins, urged after 8, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Noah And The Ark (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: beh foes st, saved grd at rear, urged after 8, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Historic Heart (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, jumped well, up str away, collared 1/8, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Salvino (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of PTH

ENTRY.COMMENT: traded bump st, bit rank early 2p, tracked 2-3w, tired

ENTRY.NAME: West Newton (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit washy, rated ins, jumped inwards at 3,5,7, yielded 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Gordon's Jet (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p, jumped well, up briefly 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Welshman
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2p, urged midway flat, faltered, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Belfast Banter (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, jumped well, bid in flat,up 1/8, comfortably

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEMPHIS broke out then was asked for speed, traveled five wide on the first turn, contested the pace on the outside, dropped a bit off the pace near the five-eighths then re-engaged the new leader, vied in the three then two path on the far turn, took the lead near the five-sixteenths, fought outside of the runner-up under a left-handed crop in the stretch and narrowly prevailed under strong handling. CLOUD FOREST brushed the outside of the gate at the start then brushed with a rival, saved ground on the first turn, settled just off the pace, was asked to move up through a rail opening with five furlongs to run, took the lead then briefly inched clear before being challenged, vied inside on the final turn, was headed under urging around the five-sixteenths, fought on well inside of the winner under the crop in the stretch but just missed while well clear for the place. HAPPY BOB brushed with a rival at the start, lugged out five wide early on the turn then dropped to the four path, was rated off the pace under a snug hold, came under urging in the three path on the far turn, chased four wide under a drive into the stretch, pursued the leading duo into the final furlong, drifted in near the sixteenth-pole and weakened but was well clear for the show. STEADY PROGRESS bumped with rivals on both sides while in the three path on the first turn, contested the pace between foes, dropped back near the half-mile pole, came up empty in the two path on the far turn and capitulated. UNION TAP hit the inside of the gate then stumbled and was last to commence, was carried out early, went four then three wide on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, traveled two to three wide while roused on the far turn and failed to respond. HINENI bumped with a foe while in the two path on the first turn, contested the pace on the inside of rivals then was passed on the fence near the five-eighths, chased inside through the far turn and tired. GOLDEN PURCHASE bumped with a rival while four wide and between horses on the first turn, dropped back near the five-eighths, was urged four then five wide on the far turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Hineni
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd 2p1st turn,pace ins foes,drop back,chsd ins2nd,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cloud Forest
ENTRY.OWNER: Wygod Martin J Wygod Pam and Bushnell Emily
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd gate,brshd foe,hustld,ins,mvd up5/8,lead,ins2nd,headed,miss

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Italian Stallions Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,lug out 1st,5-4p,rated,ask 3p2nd turn,drift in1/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Union Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,stumbled,4-3p1st turn,reserved,ask2-3p2nd turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Steady Progress
ENTRY.OWNER: Chatterpaul Naipaul PrepsToThePros Racing Stables LLC and Albaroudy Mansour
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn 3w1st,pace,drop back1/2,empty 2p2nd,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Purchase
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd 4p1st turn,drop back5/8,urged 4-5w2nd,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC Don Alberto Stable and Siena Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w1st,outside pace,vied 3-2p2nd,ask5/16,dueled outside,prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN DAGGER chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, edged away under a drive to prevail. PROUD FOOT was a bit fractious when the latch was sprung and got away half a beat slow, then got forced to steady between rivals when each foe next door came her way, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the place honors. WESTERN LANE chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and kept on to procure the show honors. MADDIE'S GRACE broke out at the start forcing PROUD FOOT to steady and bumping solidly with FLIP MY ID, led briefly before being eased off to chase just off the inside in aim of the front, tipped three wide through the turn and was patiently handled, swung four to five wide for home, got roused straightened away, seized command near the eighth pole and was quickly overthrown inside that station, then weakened in the late stages. NOW SHOWING bobbled awkwardly at the break recovering outwards, raced four then three wide in aim of the front, swung three wide into upper stretch under urging, took command straightened away briefly before being displaced by the aforementioned foe near the eighth pole and weakened to the finish. FLIP MY ID bobbled at the break recovering inwards and got bumped solidly by MADDIE'S GRACE as that rival broke outwards and forced PROUD FOOT as a tandem to steady in behind and between them, raced in aim briefly three wide before taking command tucked to the two path down the backstretch, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths with NOW SHOWING applying pressure outside along with MADDIE'S GRACE, took the inside route into upper stretch under challenge and yielded straightened away, then tired to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Maddie's Grace
ENTRY.OWNER: Demeric Nick and Newsome John S
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, led briefly, chased 2p, 3w turn, 4-5w upper, up, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Foot
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Flip My Id
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped st, in hand 3-2w, ins 1/4p, yielded, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Dagger
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, up ins 1/8, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Now Showing
ENTRY.OWNER: Hidden Brook Farm and Denholtz Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, 4-3w in aim, 3w uppr, up str away, collared, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Western Lane
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Streak Racing LLC Second Opinion Stable and Spiesman Rich
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, inside 1/4, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% A ftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONTBELATE lugged out shortly after the start, dropped back to the inside while in hand on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, was roused while shifting from the two path to the four path early on the far turn, came under the crop inside the five-sixteenths, was taken in hand briefly off heels near the three-sixteenths then carried out, rallied outside into the final furlong, drifted in while gaining coming to the sixteenth-pole and got up to prevail. SOUPER CATCH angled in while going to the front, traveled around the first turn in the two path, showed the way while inside of a rival, was urged along while inside on the far turn, lost the advantage at the three-eighths, turned into upper stretch on even terms for the lead, fought on well to the finish but missed while just able to get the place. MUSICAL HEART bumped with a rival at the start then bumped with foes on both sides early, went four then three wide on the initial turn, prompted the pace on the outside, took a short lead in the two path at the three-eighths, turned into upper stretch under a drive, lost the lead back to the runner-up outside the sixteenth-pole and was outfinished then just missed the place while clear for the show. GRUMPS LITTLE TOTS bumped with rivals on both sides shortly after the start then checked while pinched back between foes, dropped from the three path to the two path on the first turn, settled at the rear, was urged along in the three path on the far turn, gained in upper stretch, drifted in near the furlong marker and finished willingly along the rail. BREADMAN was hustled from the gate, came outward early while shadowed out by the inside rival then bumped with a foe, went three wide around the opening bend, tracked the pace on the outside, was given his cue in the three path on the far turn, drifted out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. GREAT WORKOUT bumped with an opponent at the start then bumped again with that foe before being carried out, went four wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along passing the half-mile pole, rounded the far turn in the two path and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dontbelate
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged out early,in hand,ins,well placed,urged 2-4p2nd,rallied,up

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: River Card Stable and Jacobson David
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,bmpd btwn,4-3p1st,out,2p2nd,led3/8-1/8,missed,lost2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Breadman
ENTRY.COMMENT: hstld,came out early,bmp,3p1st,trckd out,ask3p2nd,drft out,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Grumps Little Tots
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp btwn brk,chckd,3-2p1st,at rear,3w2nd,gain,drift in1/8,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Great Workout
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,bmp,carried out,4w1st,settled,urged1/2,2p2nd,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Catch
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,2p1st,pace,urged rail 2nd,headed3/8,fought on,held2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK THE WEEKEND chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying to issue a challenge through the final furlong and was up in the last jumps to the finish to prevail. DEE'S SPEEDSTRE got bumped at the start by LITTLE FRAPPUCINO and in turn bumped RUN SMITTY RUN, chased the pace four then three wide advancing to take command near the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and was caught in the final jumps to the finish. RUN SMITTY RUN bobbled and was bumped at the start, chased along the inside, came under coaxing at the nine-sixteenths and tipped three wide through the far turn, went five to six wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to secure the show honors. LITTLE FRAPPUCINO broke out at the start bumping DEE'S SPEEDSTRE into RUN SMITTY RUN, showed the way in hand along the inside under prompting from EXCESS DEMAND to the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths when displaced from the front by that rival, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened in the drive. EXCESS DEMAND prompted the pace two to three wide advancing under coaxing to take command at the three-eighths, got displaced from the front with five-sixteenths to run, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. PAPI ON ICE traded bumps after the start with two rivals, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. GINNSU WARRIOR traded bumps after the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, spun three wide for home and made no impact. REUNION TOUR struck the off side stall at the start, then traded bumps after the start with a pair of rivals, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung four wide for home and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Frappucino
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, yield, cut corner, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Speedstre
ENTRY.OWNER: Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Celeritas Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4-3w, up 5/16, 2w 1/4p, clear, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Run Smitty Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble, bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 9/16, 5-6w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Ginnsu Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Papi On Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 7/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Reunion Tour
ENTRY.OWNER: Ferraro James W Barbati Kenneth B and Citarella Diana
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, bump after st, chased 2-3w, 4w uppr, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Rock the Weekend
ENTRY.OWNER: Pure Bred Funding LLC and Douthit Stephen J
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, angled 4w upper, dug in, up last jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Excess Demand
ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H Drown Jeffrey and Rachel Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 2-3w, took over coaxed 2p 3/8, inside 1/4, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN'S MARTINI bumped with a rival at the start then was hustled, raced between foes under urging, dropped from the two path to the rail near the three-eighths pole, climbed some into the kickback at that juncture, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to the lead under a left-handed crop coming to the furlong marker, kicked clear inside that marker and proved much the best under a hand-ride in the final sixteenth. KHOZY COLBY was away awkwardly then bumped with a foe, moved up while showing good speed on the outside, shook clear late on the backstretch, dropped from the four path the two path on the turn, moved to the rail while asked near the quarter-pole, was put to a right-handed crop in upper stretch, lost the advantage to the winner outside the furlong marker and proved no match while able to hold the place. CRAZY CAMI was urged along off the pace, went three wide early on the turn, dropped to the two path briefly and made light contact with the winner near the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and lacked the needed response while up for the show. GINUCCHA was hustled from the gate, pressed the pace between horses, chased in the three path on the turn, pursued the leader under a drive into the final furlong and tired. ILIKEFUNSIZE showed good speed towards the inside, jostled with a foe late on the backstretch, chased inside on the turn, spun into the stretch in the two path, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. FLOWERS FOR ME broke a bit slow, raced well back in the field, was urged three then four wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. ALMOND FUDGE was hustled from the start then urged along on the outside, went four then three wide on the turn and capitulated. LISA'S PALACE bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along on the inside, dropped back significantly and lost position leaving the backstretch, raced inside to the two path on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to respond. SUN AND WIND pressed the pace between horses, jostled with a foe late on the backstretch, chased in the two path through the turn and had nothing left. BERTRILLE was bumped at the start and forced out, raced on the outside under urging, traveled around the turn in the five path and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lisa's Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urged,lost position bad 1/2,ins-2p,mvd out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Martini
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp st,btwn,2p-ins turn,climbd some3/8,light bmp,4w3/16,rally,clr

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mucho Macho Man Syndicate & Kari Provost

ENTRY.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Five Hellions Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,jostled1/2,chased inside turn,2path into lane,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Crazy Cami
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,2-3path turn,light bump 5/16,5w into lane,up show

ENTRY.NAME: Flowers for Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,well back,3-4widee turn,6w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sun and Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between,jostled 1/2,chased 2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ginuccha
ENTRY.OWNER: Cash is King LLC and LC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pressed btwn,chased 3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Almond Fudge
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged along outside,4-3path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Khozy Colby
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkwrd brk,bmp,outside,clr1/2,4-2p trn,rail1/4,headed1/8,held2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bertrille
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced out,outside,5wide turn,no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1M Inner turf CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTION AL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred )(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LISA'S VISION settled just off the inside just off the pace, tucked inside with seven-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, dug in tussling with the former leader, shook that rival off confronted by the runner up and just held on at the finish. CLASSIC COLORS settled just off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, closed well through the stretch to the finish and just missed on the wire. MASTEROF THE TUNES established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught a furlong out, ran on through to the finish to preserve the show honors. GOLDEN ROCKET saved ground near at the rear of the field, tipped to the two path at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. TOOLCAT just off the pace tracking the front three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, weakened. IM JUST KIDDIN three wide through the first turn, chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch, went four wide through the far turn and was nudged five wide by HOME FOR CHRISTMAS at the three-eighths, got placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and offered no response. COLLABORATION a bit fractious prior to the start, raced three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and weakened. DUFRESNE chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened in the drive. HOME FOR CHRISTMAS just off the inside through the first turn, chased three wide until tipped four wide at the three-eighths nudging IM JUST KIDDIN five wide at that station, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went five wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Colors
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p mid pack, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, closed well, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Masterof the Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 7/16, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, caught, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Dufresne
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, cut corner, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lisa's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2p, to ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, up 1/8p, dug in, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Home for Christmas
ENTRY.OWNER: Iglesias Jesse Abdala III Albert P and Garcia Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, tipped 4w 3/8, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, to 2p 7/16, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Collaboration
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious gate, 3-2w in aim, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Toolcat
ENTRY.OWNER: Klimasewski Robert G and Klimasewski Tammy
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 3w, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Im Just Kiddin
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 3-4w, nudged 5w 3/8, 6w upper, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80 ,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIXTYTHREECALIBER went four then three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused in the two path on the far turn, chased under a left-handed crop into the final furlong, eased out a path at that juncture, gained to get the lead inside the sixteenth-pole and narrowly prevailed under steady urging. NOSTALGIC went four wide on the first turn, settled at the back with the benefit of cover, was asked while three then four wide on the far turn, chased outside into the final furlong, gained to make a bid near the sixteenth-pole and just missed while able to secure the place. GERRYMANDER went straight to the front, was put under tight restraint in the three path on the first turn, gave up the advantage while placed under stronger restraint coming to the three-quarter pole, prompted outside from that juncture, was let out in the two path on the far turn then asked near the quarter-pole, took a short lead in upper stretch, led under a drive into the final sixteenth but was caught while able to get the show. MIDNIGHT STROLL was hustled from the gate, raced inside on the first turn, moved to the lead approaching the three-quarter pole, showed the way inside of a rival, was asked while inside on the far turn, lost the lead under a drive in upper stretch, fought on well into the final sixteenth but was outfinished late. FAVOR went five then four wide on the first turn, settled comfortably on the outside, was given her cue in the three path on the far turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Stroll
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Schoenfeld Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ins1st,to front3/4,ask rail 2nd,headed3/16,outkckd late

ENTRY.NAME: Gerrymander
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,in hand,3p,gave up lead3/4,out,2p2nd,led3/16-1/16,caught

ENTRY.NAME: Nostalgic
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4p1st,settled with cover,ask3-4w2nd turn,chased,willingly,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sixtythreecaliber
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3p1st,settled,ask 2p2nd turn,chased,gained1/16,up,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Favor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w1st,settled outside,ask 3w2nd turn,chased,weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Turf CR: 94. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANNA KARENINE (FR) two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three to four wide into upper stretch rallying to take command three-sixteenths from home, inched away briefly, then dug in under threat to the outside and held game to prevail. CADENCIA coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied through the final furlong to tussle with the aforementioned foe through the final sixteenth but was ultimately repelled to the end. DEKANTER three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. GUN BOAT showed the way in hand along the inside through swift splits under pressure from LITTLE MOMBO to the outside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, got collared with three-sixteenths to go and weakened to the finish. HIHELLOHOWAREYOU chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped out inside the eighth pole three to four paths and passed tired rivals. LITTLE MOMBO prompted the pace from the outside three then two wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. MISS DOMINA coaxed from the gate, chased five then four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking three wide through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a light drive and was altered out a path inside the eighth pole as HIHELLOHOWAREYOU tipped out safely clear in front and made no impact. FLEETFOOTED coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Domina
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5-4w backstretch, 3w turn, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Hihellohowareyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, tip out ins 1/8, by tired

ENTRY.OWNER: Newman Roger H and Aldabbagh Omar
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w uppr, rallied, repelled

ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael e Five Racing Thoroughbreds and Seventh Sense S
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 3-4w upper, up 3/16, dug in, game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: New York Stallion Series S. SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Inner turf CR: 82. Stakes Purse 150000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD ELIGIBLE FOR THE NEW YORK STALLION STAKES.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORANGE FREEZE brushed the outside of the gate at the start, went three wide on the first turn, settled towards the rear on the outside, was roused while angling from the two path to the five path on the far turn, rallied four wide into the stretch, closed strongly to get the lead into the final furlong, kicked clear under a left-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and held under strong urging. BERNT AGAIN saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear, was roused while moving from the two path to the four path on the far turn, shifted five wide approaching the quarter-pole, gained outside while remaining on her inside lead until just inside the sixteenth-pole and finished with good courage to secure the place. MZ BIG BUCKS was well placed in the second flight while saving ground, moved through to take the lead late on the backstretch, shook clear along the rail on the far turn, was asked for her best in upper stretch, lost the advantage to the winner into the final furlong and weakened but was clear for the show. RED MOON traveled around the first turn in the two path, was reserved towards the rear, saved ground on the far turn, was held up some behind horses from the five-sixteenths to near the quarter-pole, cut the corner with a clear rail opening into the stretch, moved off the rail near the furlong marker and lacked the needed response. LITTLE LINZEE bumped with a rival at the start, bumped with foes on both sides early, angled in entering the first turn, settled on the inside, was roused on the far turn, turned into the stretch in the two path and came up empty. BEA BEA KAZ bumped with a rival at the start, went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged three to four wide on the far turn, moved out while dropping back in upper stretch and capitulated. CLOVER STREET bumped with a rival early then was taken up, steadied some into the first turn, rounded that bend in the two path, settled between foes, dropped back in the two path on the far turn, floated five into the stretch and had nothing left. CAMP AKEELA bumped with an opponent early, went around the first turn in the three path, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the three path through the far turn and faded. QUEENS OVER THREES moved in while going to the front and put some foes in tight quarters, showed the way in the two path with a clear advantage, lost the lead late on the backstretch and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved ins-2path,behind foes 5/16-1/4,cut corner,2p1/8,flattend

ENTRY.NAME: Bernt Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,at rear,2-4p2nd turn,5p1/4,good courage,up for place
